summary: Star Wars is a popular American space adventure story created by George Lucas. It started as a movie in 1977 and grew into a huge franchise with many films, TV shows, books, and games. The story has three main parts: the original trilogy, the prequel trilogy, and the sequel trilogy. Each trilogy has three movies. The films have made over $10 billion, making it one of the biggest movie franchises ever. Star Wars is known for its unique universe, cool characters, and exciting battles between good and evil.
title: Star Wars
